<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Harden Flesh](/Feats.aspx?ID=2978) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 200 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[stone order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=6)

**Requirements**
You're standing on earthen or stone ground.

</column>

---

You fortify your skin with minerals drawn from earth and stone. You gain resistance 3 to physical damage, except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374), until the beginning of your next turn. At 12th level, and every 4 levels thereafter, the resistance increases by 1, to a maximum of resistance 6 at 20th level.
